about: I am deeply enthusiastic about coding and take immense pleasure in working alongside a dynamic, multi-disciplinary team where their boundless creativity can spur me to bring out my best work. During my free time, I relish the company of my beloved family and friends. Ultimately, I cherish a relaxed environment where I can enjoy a hearty laugh over some great jokes.

work_experience.description: As the lead developer for the Android project, I am responsible for its development and direction. In addition, I conducted an analysis of the mobile department's development process and worked with a colleague on the iOS team to restructure the department. Through this process, we implemented improvements to the development process such as modularization of components, and continuous integration and distribution processes.
main_responsibilities: Restructuring internal and external SDKs for use in several projects
Managing internal continuous integration and distribution processes

work_experience.description: As the Mobile Team Leader for both Android and iOS development, I was responsible for coordinating with other departments at BeatStars to ensure seamless integration of mobile development efforts. In addition to leading the development of the BeatStars Marketplace for Android and iOS, I was responsible for maintaining and updating previously released apps while keeping abreast of the latest technologies and trends in the market. My main responsibilities included developing native apps for both platforms, defining the technologies to use in Android and iOS, and serving as a UX design consultant.
main_responsibilities: Development of native apps for iOS and Android
Defining the technologies to use in Android and iOS
Serving as a UX design consultant
